pullRequest.title: [Flink-15583] Fixing scala walkthrough archetype does not compile on Java 11
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
This PR fixes scala walkthrough archetype does not compile on Java 11.
Brief change log

Fixing scala walkthrough archetype does not compile on Java 11.
Activiating walkthrough e2e tests.
Fixing e2e tests to actually test the archetype under test and not the previously published.

Verifying this change

Walkthrough e2e tests.

Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (yes / no / don't know)

Documentation

If yes, how is the feature documented? (not applicable / docs / JavaDocs / not documented)

afterCommit.message: [Flink-15583][e2e] Add walkthroughs to misc e2e split

commit.message:
[hotfix][e2e] Compile walkthroughs for e2e tests

The partial compilation in nightly only compiles flind-end-to-end-tests
for performance reasons. However, that resulted in outdated walkthrough
archetypes among other issues.

beforeCommit.message: [Flink-15583][e2e] Add walkthroughs to misc e2e split

afterCommit.message:
[hotfix][e2e] Force local archetype catalog

Prevents subtle issues with archetypes accidentally being downloaded from the snapshot repository.
